full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,BLA MA BKA' DRIN RJES SU DRAN PA'I GSOL 'DEBS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI BLA MA'I BKA' DRIN DRAN NAS GSOL BA 'DEBS SHING THUGS RJE BSKUL BA GRUB PA'I SPRIN SGRA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BRGYAD KYI 'CHAR BA SPANGS TE, ,'KHRUL MED KYI LAM LA BSGRUB SNYING PO BYED PA RNAMS KYI SPYAN DU GYUR BA, ,RANG GI SLOB MA GNAS BCU RAB 'BYAMS PA DGE 'DUN RGYAL MTSAN DANG, ,DAD PA PHUN SUM TSOGS PA'I 'BYOR LDAN, ,GU SHRI SE CHEN CHOS RJE GNYIS KYIS LUS LONGS SPYOD THAMS CAD BLTOS MED DU PHUL NAS, ,BLA MA BKA' DRIN RJES SU ZHING, ,THUGS RJE BSGRUB MING SPEL DANG BCAS PA RGYAS ZHIG DGOS CES YANG YANG NAN GYIS RTEN NAS, ,BLA MA DAM PA'I BKA' 'BANGS THA CHUNG MDO RGYUD MAN NGAG 'DZIN PA'I RGYAL KHAMS PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS @007B BRTAL DANG MTSAN, ,SBYOR SOGS KYIS MA BCINGS PAR, ,KUN GYIS GO BDE BAR MDO RGYUD MKHA' 'GRUB DAM PA, ,RNAMS K YIS BKA' SROL BZHIN, ,RAS 'PHRUL SNANG SH'AKYA'I RGYAL PO'I PHO BRANG DU, ,SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, ,DGE TSUL BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS SO, ,BLA MED BYANG CHUB THOB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
